TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DbExpressionVisitor`1<TResultType> extends System.Object
generic <typename TResultType> public ref class DbExpressionVisitor abstract

typeparam.name: TResultType
typeparam.span: visitor 所產生之結果的型別。

span.span: The type of the result produced by the visitor.

summary.span: 定義應該由傳回特定型別之結果值的訪客所實作的基本功能。

span.span: Defines the basic functionality that should be implemented by visitors that return a result value of a specific type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是描述運算式周遊的抽象類別 (Abstract Class)。The is an abstract class that describes expression traversal.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 實作運算式的訪客模式。

span.span: Implements the visitor pattern for expressions.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，處理無法辨識型別的任何運算式。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, handles any expression of an unrecognized type.
A result value of a specific type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遇到其他無法辨識型別的運算式時，就會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when an expression of an otherwise unrecognized type is encountered.
